actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 96-1260.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, S. Rept. 96-1021.

official_title: A bill to reinstate and validate United States oil and gas leases numbered OCS-P-O218 and OCS-P-O226.

summary.text: Deems certain oil and gas leases to be in full force and effect under specified conditions.

titles.title: A bill to reinstate and validate United States oil and gas leases numbered OCS-P-O218 and OCS-P-O226.
